description: Sister Synful Pleasure is leading her bible study class, but Alex and Eddie are giggling and not paying attention. And worse, sticking a rosary in Alex's panties. And now they're going to be really, really sorry, because the strict Sister doesn't take any crap. The misbehaving students are made to strip naked and bend over the pulpit. Alex gets punished first, as Sister Pleasure gets her ass nice and red with flogging. Then it's Eddie's turn and he's no longer smiling and giggling, especially when the sadistic Sister crops his feet. And she's just getting started! (Part 1 of 2)
title: Bible Class
